transArray.content: The front desk service is very good and guests are treated with respect. Every part of the room is cleaned and impeccable. The room facilities are complete. I am very satisfied with my stay. The service is very good. The room is large, bright and very comfortable. The breakfast is also good. A lot, very delicious and very cost-effective

Hello, dear guests, may your four seasons be filled with flowers and plants in spring, little skirts in summer, dusk and fallen leaves in autumn, and sunshine and warmth in winter. I love you little man.
